column4: In either case, anyone read manga here? I'm following iD_entity right now. Dem Korianz iz crazy...
etherape is when you plug a crossed cable into a switch without spanning tree and wait for a broadcast-package...
(both ends of the cable into the switch !)
hoo hoo ick!
hoo hoo ick????
Ape talk. anyway, I've done that. Was in a coma for 3 weeks.
what does a ape has to do with broadcast-storms and coma??
I was talking about etherape/wireshark. Where you?
etherape is when you plug a crossed cable into a switch without spanning tree and wait for a broadcast-package...
Yeah you said that. I did that. Silly me, I plugged into a power outlet, not a dataport. I was in a coma for 6 weeks.
tat was the second time I did that.
i got 230 volts a few times - never ended in more than a little scream ;)
I must have more salt and heavy metals in my blood than usual, then. Nearly killed -me-...
not so funny one... ;)
roleplay, not comedy... And you never believed the first word, huh? ;)
i played dsa and dnd a few yrs ago...
I've lived and breathed WhiteWolf for 10 years now.
okay... so your stamina may be higher than mine...
my roleplay-time ended when i started working ;)
You've heard the saying 'I don't work. Takes away my fishing time'?
no i didn't - but there is some truth in it
